title: Coronation Street spoilers confirm clash for Carla and Beth after Sinead's death

Coronation Street spoilers have revealed new drama in the fallout to Sinead Tinker's death, as her family clash.

Carla Connor's plan to create a legacy for sister-in-law Sinead, who lost her battle with cancer on Friday, and raise money for her baby son Bertie backfires when Sinead's aunt Beth is left furious.

At the beginning of the week, a package arrives for Sinead and it's ingredients for her beard oil business.

Carla decides to try and keep the venture going in Sinead's honour, and to keep money coming in for Sinead's grieving husband Daniel Osbourne and baby son Bertie.

After finding the recipe, she gets going with the preparation before she's rumbled by Beth.

(Image: ITV)

Beth walks in on her making the oil and is left furious, believing she's taking advantage.

Carla explains to her that all the profits are going towards little Bertie's future.

Will Beth believe her, and let her continue with Sinead's legacy?

(Image: ITV)

It seems this could be the case as Carla attempts to get a bigger audience for the business later on in the week.

She reveals to Ken that she has a meeting with a company who are interested in buying Sinead's beard oil.

Carla wants Daniel's input though, before making any decisions.

(Image: ITV)

Ken makes contact with son Daniel who's still in Scotland with little Bertie, wanting him back on the Street.

But after a recent run-in with Beth over his kiss with Bethany Platt before Sinead died, will he return?

Beth isn't so sure she can forgive the character, while Daniel has been in turmoil ever since especially now his wife has gone.

Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
description: Coronation Street residents are still struggling in the fallout to Sinead Tinker's death next week, leading to a row
